main event: The UFO sighting occurred on 6 May 1958 in E, Spain, and was observed for 15 minutes. The UFO was described as resembling a satellite in color and disappearing and reappearing at an extremely high altitude. The report includes photographs of the sighting.
interesting points: The observer described the UFO as appearing almost directly overhead at an extremely high altitude with characteristics resembling a satellite.
The observation lasted for 15 minutes, and the UFO was reported to have disappeared and reappeared.
The sighting was considered a probable satellite observation, and there was no confirmation of satellite characteristics.
The observer, S/Sgt Willard E. Bryant, had been in the United States Air Force for seven years, adding credibility to the report.
The preliminary analysis suggested that the UFO sighting was not unlike that of a shooting star and was interpreted as a meteor pending further information.
witnesses: Military - S/Sgt Willard E. Bryant, Civilian - Mrs. -------
